item.title: Python post
item.description: Python is one of the most popular programming languages in the world, and it is getting progressively more popular every day! Python is great for lots of things, but in this example I will show how it can be used in the realm of biology for the purpose of aligning sequences of DNA. The Needlman-Wunsch algorithim was developed in 1970 for the purpose of finding the optimal alignment of two different DNA sequences.
